channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【RC1: Semantic Kernel for Java Agents API】RC1：Java代理API的语义内核
item.description: 【We’re excited to announce the release candidate of the Semantic Kernel for Java Agents API! This marks a major step forward in bringing the power of intelligent agents to Java developers, enabling them to build rich, contextual, and interactive AI experiences using the Semantic Kernel framework. What Are Agents in Semantic Kernel? Agents are intelligent, autonomous […]】我们很高兴宣布Java Adent Api的语义内核发行候选者！这标志着将智能代理商的力量带到Java开发人员，使他们能够使用语义内核框架来建立丰富，上下文和交互式AI体验。语义内核中的代理是什么？代理人是聪明的，自主的[…]

item.title: 【Nested App Authentication: Now generally available across Microsoft 365】嵌套应用程序身份验证：现在通常在Microsoft 365上找到
item.description: 【Get started with Nested App Authentication, a modern protocol for simplifying authentication for Personal Tab Teams apps that run across Microsoft 365.】开始使用Nested App Authentication，这是一种现代协议，用于简化Microsoft 365运行的个人选项卡团队的身份验证。

item.title: 【Fedora Linux is now an official WSL distro】Fedora Linux现在是官方WSL发行版
item.description: 【We’re pleased to announce that one of the latest additions to the list of official WSL distros is Fedora Linux! The Fedora Project has taken advantage of WSL’s new tar-based architecture to produce WSL images beginning with Fedora 42. Try it out To install it, run wsl –-install FedoraLinux-42and then launch it with wsl –d […]】我们很高兴地宣布，官方WSL发行版列表中的最新添加是Fedora Linux！ Fedora Project已利用WSL的新基于TAR的体系结构来生产以Fedora 42开头的WSL图像。尝试安装它，运行WSL - 安装Fedoralinux-42，然后使用WSL –D […]启动它。

item.title: 【What’s New in vcpkg (April 2025)】VCPKG的新功能（2025年4月）
item.description: 【This blog post summarizes changes to the vcpkg package manager as part of the 2025.04.09 registry release, 2025-03-22, 2025-04-01, and 2025-04-07 tool releases, as well as changes to vcpkg documentation throughout April. This release contains bug fixes, a new documentation article on offline usage of vcpkg, and other minor improvements. Arm64 Linux users of vcpkg […]】这篇博客文章总结了VCPKG软件包管理器的更改，作为2025.04.09注册表版本的一部分，即2025-03-22、2025-04-01和2025-04-07工具发行，以及整个4月VCPKG文档的更改。该版本包含错误修复程序，有关VCPKG离线使用情况的新文档文档以及其他较小的改进。 VCPKG的ARM64 Linux用户[…]

item.title: 【Reinventing Legacy App Modernization: Crowdbotics’ AI-Native Platform on Azure】重塑旧应用应用现代化：Crowdbotics在Azure上的AI本地平台
item.description: 【Author: Charath Ranganathan, CTO, Crowdbotics Modernizing legacy applications is one of the most daunting tasks facing enterprises today. These systems, often built decades ago using technologies like COBOL on mainframes, power critical business functions but are notoriously difficult, time-consuming, and expensive to update or replace. The process typically involves painstaking manual efforts to understand undocumented […]】作者：Charath Ranganathan，CTO，CrowdB​​otics现代化的旧应用程序是当今企业面临的最艰巨的任务之一。这些系统经常在几十年前使用大型机上的COBOL，功率关键业务功能等技术建造，但众所周知，更新或更换的既艰难，耗时又昂贵。该过程通常涉及艰苦的手动努力，以了解无证件[…]

item.title: 【What were the intended uses of those icons in moricons.dll?】这些图标在moricons.dll中的预期用途是什么？
item.description: 【Icons for old MS-DOS apps.】旧MS-DOS应用的图标。

item.title: 【Announcing the updated Teams AI Library and MCP support】宣布更新的团队AI库和MCP支持
item.description: 【Discover the new and improved Teams AI Library, designed to help developers create even more powerful agents for Microsoft Teams.】发现新的和改进的团队AI库，旨在帮助开发人员为Microsoft团队创建更强大的代理商。

item.title: 【C++ Language Updates in MSVC in Visual Studio 2022 17.14】Visual Studio中的MSVC中的C ++语言更新2022 17.14
item.description: 【Introduction In this update, we continue the tradition of bucketing bugs into helpful categories for you all to filter through along with even more notes from the compiler team as to what, exactly, was fixed. This blog is also complemented by the recent Pure Virtual C++ pre-conference talk by RanDair Porter; so please check out […]】在此更新中，我们将继续将错误存储到有用的类别的传统中，以供大家过滤，以及编译器团队的更多笔记，以确切地解决什么。兰德尔·波特（Randair Porter）最近的纯虚拟C ++会议前演讲也补充了这个博客。所以请查看[…]

item.title: 【What were the MS-DOS programs that Windows used the progman.exe stock icons for?】Windows使用Progman.exe股票图标的MS-DOS程序是什么？
item.description: 【Mostly generic-looking icons.】主要是通用的图标。

item.title: 【Efficiently and Elegantly Modeling Embeddings in Azure SQL and SQL Server】在Azure SQL和SQL Server中有效，优雅地建模嵌入
item.description: 【Storing and querying text embeddings in a database it might seem challenging, but with the right schema design, it’s not only possible, it’s powerful. Whether you’re building AI-powered search, semantic filtering, or recommendation features, embeddings, and thus vectors, are now a first-class data type. So how do you model them well inside a database like […]】存储和查询数据库中的文本嵌入方式似乎具有挑战性，但是有了正确的模式设计，它不仅有可能强大。无论您是构建AI驱动的搜索，语义过滤还是推荐功能，嵌入以及矢量现在都是一流的数据类型。因此，您如何在[…]之类的数据库中对其进行良好的建模。
